overview:
An experienced software architect and software engineer with proven areas of expertise including desktop, mobile, enterprise and internet application development.

An Innovative leader with 11 years of experience in Enterprise-level implementation of the Software Development Life-Cycle (SDLC), including business analysis, functional & technical design, development, implementation, deployment, support, and management. Strong analysis and design expertise in implementation of medical imaging, bioinformatics, scientific computing (computational-biology, genetics (computational genomics), cheminformatics and applied-mathematics), provisioning, and Internet-aware applications for global operations in diverse industries.

Has managed clients, projects and teams of developers from project inception to delivery, mentored junior developers and provided technical direction and guidance for management staff. Specialties:

Mobile Architecture and Development, RIA Architecture and Development, N-tier Architecture, Data/Use Modeling, Performance Optimization and Data Compression, Object-Oriented Analysis, Design, and Programming (OOA, OOD, OOP) Agile/XP implementations as well as factory
